Reference

Datasets

Used in the examples.
..

MontBlanc

Mont Blanc dataset

Build Plant Functional Groups (PFG)

Functions to select dominant species, compute functional distance between species and build clusters.
..

PRE_FATE.abundBraunBlanquet()

Transform Braun-Blanquet values into relative abundances

PRE_FATE.selectDominant()

Selection of dominant species from abundance releves

PRE_FATE.speciesDistance()

Computation of distances between species based on traits and niche overlap

PRE_FATE.speciesClustering_step1()

Create clusters based on dissimilarity matrix

PRE_FATE.speciesClustering_step2()

Choose clusters and select determinant species

Create FATE-HD parameter files

Create user-friendly directory tree, parameter and simulation files for FATE-HD simulation.
..

PRE_FATE.skeletonDirectory()

Create the skeleton folder for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_namespaceConstants()

Create Namespace_constants parameter file for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_globalParameters()

Create Global_parameters parameter file for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_saveYears()

Create SAVE parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_changingYears()

Create SCENARIO parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGsuccession()

Create SUCCESSION parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGdispersal()

Create DISPERSAL parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGdisturbance()

Create DISTURBANCE parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGsoil()

Create SOIL parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_simulParameters()

Create Simul_parameters parameter file for a FATE-HD simulation

Analyze FATE-HD outputs

Evalute predicted maps, produce summary and dynamic graphics.
..

POST_FATE.graphic_evolutionCoverage()

Create a graphical representation of the evolution of PFG coverage and abundance through time for a FATE-HD simulation
